info.title: School ERP API
info.description: School Management System API with RBAC and secure cookie-based authentication

bearerAuth.description: JWT token in Authorization header (backward compatibility)

cookieAuth.name: accessToken
cookieAuth.description: JWT access token stored in HTTP-only cookie (recommended)

post.description: Create a new tenant with an admin user. If roles parameter is provided, authentication is required and user must have 'create' permission on 'roles' resource.

roles.description: Array of role names to assign to the admin user (e.g., ["Super Admin"], ["School Admin", "Principal"]). Requires authentication and 'create' permission on 'roles' resource.

tenantId.description: Tenant id of the newly created tenant (top-level for convenience)

roles.description: Assigned roles for the admin user, or available roles if no roles were assigned

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication required when assigning roles

403.description: Forbidden - user lacks permission to assign roles

409.description: Conflict - duplicate value (e.g. email already registered)

post.description: Authenticates user and sets secure HTTP-only cookies (accessToken and refreshToken). Also returns token in response body for backward compatibility.

200.description: Login successful. Cookies are set automatically.

Set-Cookie.description: HTTP-only cookies containing access and refresh tokens

token.description: Access token (also in cookie). Prefer using cookie.

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile with roles and allowed access permissions

get.summary: Get roles the authenticated user can create/manage
get.description: Returns role templates the current user may assign when creating users for a tenant. Uses RBAC permissions to determine capability.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional tenant ID to consider (defaults to user's tenant)

post.description: Uses refresh token from HTTP-only cookie to generate a new access token. Optionally rotates refresh token for enhanced security.

200.description: New access token generated and set in cookie

Set-Cookie.description: New access token cookie (and optionally new refresh token)

example.error: Refresh token expired. Please login again.

post.description: Clears authentication cookies (accessToken and refreshToken) and invalidates session. Works with both cookie and bearer token authentication.

200.description: Successfully logged out. Cookies are cleared.

get.summary: Proxy endpoint to stream images from S3
get.description: Proxy endpoint to stream images from S3 without exposing S3 URLs

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The S3 object key (stored in DB as photoKey). Can contain slashes (e.g., tenants/123/students/photo.jpg)

get.description: Returns both system roles and tenant-specific roles. If tenantId is provided, returns system roles plus roles for that tenant.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional tenant ID to filter roles

get.description: List all staff members with pagination and filtering. Requires hr_payroll:read permission.

post.description: Create a new staff member with optional file uploads (photo, resume, joining letter). Requires hr_payroll:create permission.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific staff member. Requires hr_payroll:read permission.

put.description: Update an existing staff member. All fields are optional. Requires hr_payroll:update permission.

delete.description: Soft delete a staff member (sets status to inactive). Requires hr_payroll:delete permission.

get.description: Get paginated list of students with all their information

post.description: Create a new student with all personal, academic, contact, and family information in a single request

studentName.description: Full name as per birth certificate

get.summary: Get student by id with all fields
get.description: Returns complete student information including personal, academic, contact, address, and family details

put.description: Update student information. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

schema.description: All fields from create endpoint are available for update. Only provided fields will be updated.
